potent.translation[0].definitions[0].def: having a very powerful effect or influence on your body or mind
potent.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Advertising is a potent force in showing smoking as a socially acceptable habit.
A good company pension scheme remains a potent weapon for attracting staff.
potent.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The treaty requires them to get rid of their most potent weapons.
potent.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a man who is potent is able to have sex or able to make a woman pregnant
